definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

sentences.english: Maple trees turn red in autumn.
A positive reaction is indicated by itchiness and a reddening of the skin, or a white swelling.
sentences.chinese: 陽性反應表現爲皮膚騷癢和變紅，或出現白色腫脹。

sentences.english: Sometimes reddening of the skin is caused by a skin condition.
sentences.chinese: 有時變紅的皮膚所造成的皮膚狀況。

sentences.english: My face turned red and I felt ashamed of myself.
sentences.chinese: 我的臉一會兒變紅了，我爲自己的行爲感應忸捏。

sentences.english: Her face was red from tears.
Browning rule and persified color stabilizing methods in fresh konjac tuber process has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了新鮮魔芋塊莖天然褐變紅色素固色方法。
福斯特警官的臉變紅了。

sentences.english: The cold weather turned the leaves red.
sentences.chinese: 寒冷的天氣使樹葉變紅了。

sentences.english: Browning rule and diversified color stabilizing methods in fresh konjac tuber process has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了新鮮魔芋塊莖天然褐變紅色素固色方法。

sentences.english: When I saw her become blushed I realized that I had overplayed my hand in joking with her.
sentences.chinese: 當我發現她的臉變紅時才意識到我的玩笑有點過火了。

sentences.english: The leaves now are shading into red and yellow.
sentences.chinese: 現在樹葉開始變紅變黃了。

sentences.english: Tyrion watched as Haldon's face turned green, then red, then purple.
sentences.chinese: 提利昂看着哈爾頓的臉由綠變紅再變紫。

sentences.english: Many runners get red-faced no matter how much their fitness improves.
sentences.chinese: 許多跑步的人臉都會變紅，這與他們的身體素質無關。

sentences.english: Lobsters turn scarlet when they are boiled.
sentences.chinese: 龍蝦在被煮熟的時候會變紅。

sentences.english: Sergeant Foster laughed but his face went red again.
sentences.chinese: 福斯特警官笑笑，他的臉卻又變紅了。

sentences.english: Deeper burns with red skin, fluid-filled blister and extreme pain.
sentences.chinese: 深度燒傷，皮膚變紅，有液態水泡，劇痛。

definition: to turn pale/to lose color/to go white
to change color/to discolor/to change countenance/to become angry
